document.full_text: eu finance ministers on saturday urged portugal to commit to reforms and defended the region's austerity steps as tens of thousands of european workers protested in budapest against spending cuts.
document.title: eu wants more portugal austerity as eu unions protest
lines_and_colors: eu finance ministers on saturday urged portugal to commit to reforms and defended the region's austerity steps as tens of thousands of european workers protested in budapest against spending cuts.
